snippet: LeBron James had 34 points and 10 assists as Miami beat Oklahoma City, 98-93, for its 17th straight home victory.
abstract: NBA Roundup: Miami Heat win their 17th straight victory at home, defeating Oklahoma City Thunder, 98-93; other NBA results noted.
lead_paragraph: LeBron James had 34 points and 10 assists as Miami beat Oklahoma City, 98-93, for its 17th straight home victory.

headline.seo: LeBron James Leads the Heat Past the Thunder
